message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, the $12,000 price reflects the true worth of this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
I understand that you value the product highly, but I'm still a bit shy of $10,000. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
